name: Hectic Harvest (Ludorem Studios)
description:
Welcome to Hectic Harvest! - Made for Ludum Dare 52 in around 2 days!

Enemies are invading the village! Your wheat field is the last thing keeping them from waging mass destruction on the little homes of the kingdom. Harvest your wheat (right-click) to make money and buy defenses, like walls, flamethrowers, and even medieval gatling guns! 

There are 5 towers, 3 enemies, 3 map sizes, and infinite waves! Have fun!
